articles.description: David Bakhtiari is off the Packers' PUP list after recovering from a torn ACL suffered in 2020. Despite the change in status, coach Matt LaFleur is tempering expectations for the All Pro left tackle.
articles.content:
GREEN BAY, Wis. -- David Bakhtiari's circuitous return from the torn ACL in his left knee that he sustained 598 days ago had him back on the practice field for the Green Bay Packers on Sunday.

articles.description: Tom Brady's return to the Bucs from tending to "personal things" is expected to come soon, with a source telling ESPN's Adam Schefter the veteran QB will be back "very shortly."

articles.title: Tom Weiskopf, Open champion and golf course architect, dies at 79
articles.description: Tom Weiskopf, a 16-time PGA Tour winner and Open champion who also succeeded as a course designer, has died at age 79.
